text: Pensatta is an Educational Single Page Application (SPA) focused in primary school students to develop their technological skills.
Fully responsive and mobile friendly, this SPA MVP was developed entirely in ReactJS using UI/UX principles.
Game-changer platform page for a company. A platform focused in content creation, all with high-tech tools.
Fully responsive and mobile friendly web page. Langing page for a company that wants to show elegance, expertice and great quality in their products.
I want to be productive as much as I love write code, that's why I developed a chrome extension to have a handy pomodoro timer to use when I need focus on my tasks.
In the last recent version I added a time tracker and some configuration stuff.
Crowfounding page for a monitor elevator made with Bamboo. The page has some sections depending how much you want to support this project.
Fully responsive and mobile friendly web page. Some modals and pop-ups, designed for show a quality product.
Page for a "comming soon" application. The page is simple and clean, with all links and information to get all new updates.
Fully responsive and mobile friendly web page. Developed just with core web technology to improve speed and weight.
Landing page for a marketing company. Colorful design with some animations to improve the UX and keep the attention in the content.
Fully responsive and mobile friendly web page. Small details care is a must when talking about a professional web page.
